summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to enter into an Agreement with the Arboretum Foundation and the Associated Recreation Council on behalf of the Japanese Garden Advisory Council, relating to the implementation of the Washington Park Arboretum - Japanese Garden Entry Gatehouse Project; authorizing acceptance of funds from the Arboretum Foundation for such purpose; and increasing the expenditure authority in the Department of Parks and Recreation's 2008 Adopted Budget, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
